title: Jacob Prepares to Meet Esau
summary: Genesis 32 shows Jacob preparing to meet Esau, fearing revenge. He prays for protection and sends gifts. That night, he wrestles with a mysterious man—God—and receives a new name: Israel.

faq.question: Why was Jacob afraid of Esau?
faq.answer: He believed Esau might still want to kill him for stealing the blessing.

faq.question: What is the significance of Jacob wrestling with God?
faq.answer: It symbolizes his struggle with faith, and his new name 'Israel' means 'he struggles with God.'
